name: DD Switch
author: Wouter Dijkstra

sections.description:
This plugin contains DD Switch, just a UI plugin for the admin panel. This plugin changes all checkboxes into css3 switches. When a user changes his admin scheme, the switch will change too. It’s just nice for the eye.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload the dd-switch directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. All checkboxes are changed to switches

This function is not working in Appearance/customize!
sections.faq: Do you have ideas, questions or issues with LastViewed? Please leave a message in the support forum.

short_description: Just another DD UI. Change all checkboxes in the admin panel to switches.
description:
This plugin contains DD Switch, just a UI plugin for the admin panel. This plugin changes all checkboxes into css3 switches. When a user changes his admin scheme, the switch will change too. It’s just nice for the eye.

upgrade_notice: The current version of DD-Switch requires WordPress 3.2 or higher. If you use older version of WordPress, you need to upgrade WordPress first.
